experience.title: Tech Lead, AI & Machine Learning
experience.description: At Healthify, I led a team of ML engineers focused on advancing AI-driven solutions. Collaborated closely with OpenAI and Anthropic to develop systems like ‚ÄòSnap,‚Äô an AI-powered photo tagging feature leveraging computer vision and visual language models (VLMs) for food tracking. Additionally, I contributed to building recommendation systems and developing predictive models for continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) using time-series analysis.

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Worked on DockNet, a tool that divides the big neural network into smaller components that can run on docker individually. Also implemented several protocols on VANET and SUMO.
